mapper.select: SELECT hos.hpt_name, geo2.adrs_new FROM hospital AS hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo2 AS geo2 ON hos.hpt_id = geo2.hpt_id LIMIT 0,30

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, IFNULL (NULLIF(geo.adrs_new,''), geo.adrs_old) address, avg(rv.hpt_rate) rate_avg, count(rv.rv_id) review_cnt FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo2 as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv ON hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id GROUP BY hos.hpt_id HAVING hos.hpt_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hpt_name},'%') ORDER BY hos.hpt_name ASC

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, IFNULL (NULLIF(geo.adrs_new,''), geo.adrs_old) address, avg(rv.hpt_rate) rate_avg, count(rv.hpt_rate) review_cnt FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo2 as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv on hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id WHERE geo.province=#{province} AND geo.city=#{city} GROUP BY hos.hpt_id ORDER BY hos.hpt_name ASC

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, hos.hpt_phone, hos.hpt_open, hos.hpt_hit, geo.adrs_new, geo.adrs_old, rv.rv_id, rv.rv_title, rv.rv_content, rv.rv_reg_date FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo2 as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv ON hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id WHERE hos.hpt_id=#{hpt_id}
SELECT avg(hpt_rate), count(rv_id) FROM review WHERE hpt_id=#{hpt_id}
SELECT hos.hpt_name, IFNULL (NULLIF(geo.adrs_new,''), geo.adrs_old) address FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo2 as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id WHERE province=#{province} AND city=#{city}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hospital_geo2 WHERE city=#{city}
